title: Brian Rosenwald: "Talk Radio's America"
description: Michael talks with UPenn's Dr. Brian Rosenwald, author of "Talk Radio’s America: How an Industry Took Over a Political Party That Took Over the United States." Original air date 13 August 2019. The book was published on 13 August 2019.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Brian Rosenwald, Michael Smerconish)
